text:
@Laurie_Garrett @rahulsood @POTUS The only sensible thing to do given that 15 cadets tested positive for #covid19 is to lock down the country again

Every business. Every school. Every government office

Protests are ok, but close everything until we develop a vaccine

Thank goodness none have been hospitalized!
